P008722.project_name: Videle Balaria Enhanced Oil Recovery Project

keywords.cdata: Barrel,Barrel of oil,basic energy,brown coal,chemical industry,Coal,coal production,coal supplies,Coke,Commercial Fuels,conservation projects,Construction,consumption of energy,consumption of oil,cooking,Crude Oil,crude oil exports,Crude Oil Production,demand for energy,domestic energy,domestic energy production,domestic fuel,domestic oil production,domestic oil supply,domestic supply,Ecology,Economic Analysis,economic growth,economic value,electric power,Electric Power Generation,Electrical Energy,electricity,energy conservation,energy conservation measures,Energy Consumption,energy consumption levels,Energy Economics,energy efficiency,energy intensity,energy intensive,energy planning,energy prices,energy production,Energy Research,Energy Resources,energy savings,Energy Sources,Energy Supply,energy use,Expenditures,exploitation,Extraction,food production,Forestry,fuel,fuel consumption,fuel oil,fuel prices,Fuel Type,fuel use,fuels,Gas,gas fields,gas industry,gas liquids,Gas Oil,gas output,gas pipelines,gas processing plants,Gas Production,gas reservoirs,gases,gasoline,geological exploration,GNP,Gross National Product,Growth in energy consumption,heat,heating,Income,Insurance,lignite,machinery,mines,national income,natural gas,natural gas,natural gas processing,natural gas production,Net imports,nuclear energy,nuclear power,Oil,oil,Oil and Gas,oil companies,oil consumption,oil crisis,oil equivalent,oil exports,oil fields,oil importer,oil imports,Oil Production,Oil Recovery,Oil

project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project consists of: (i) drilling of about 910 new wells for air injection and oil production; (ii) construction of 24 oil and gas separation centers nine of which will be equipped with water injection facilities; (iii) construction of a central oil treatment, storage and pumping facility similar to the existing facility which will also be expanded; (iv) construction of a treatment facility for water reinjected into the reservoir; (v) construction of air injection facilities comprising five compressor stations; (vi) laying of approximately 1,300 km of pipelines and flow lines for air and water injection, gas supply and fluid collection and disposal; (vii) construction of power substations and distribution lines, and treated water and steam supply facilities; (viii) construction of about 50 km of main and 70 km of access roads and field offices and laboratories; (ix) laboratory and field monitoring instruments; and (x) engineering and technical services.
